title: Learn Plus: Dog Photography Techniques with Lindsay Adler
summary: Lindsay Adler introduces a comprehensive episode on photographing dogs, showcasing a variety of styles ranging from commercial portraits to high-fashion editorials and creative lighting setups.

steps.action: Capture sellable dog portraits in natural settings, demonstrated with a small dog in a doorway.
Create fashion editorials by posing models with dogs in a studio environment.
Utilize creative lighting setups, such as colored LED tubes, to create dynamic images.
Employ hard lighting sources to cast dramatic shadows for a high-fashion aesthetic.

key_takeaways: Dog photography can range from simple, sellable portraits to complex fashion editorials.
Creative lighting tools like RGB tubes add unique visual interest to pet photography.
Integrating dogs into fashion shoots involves coordinating styling and dramatic lighting.
